basics.name: Arseniy (Sunny) Avery
basics.label: Software Engineering Manager
basics.summary: Software Engineering manager with 7+ years of experience. Specializing in full stack Javascript/NodeJS with experience building web, mobile and backend applications.

work.name: Ascendum Solutions
work.summary: Joined Ascendum in April 2020 and have since worked with numerous clients as well as on internal project in many capacities, from software engineer, architecture and leadership.
highlights: Frontend lead on an internal AI product that lets companies deploy personalized GPT chatbots that have the context of their orgs policies, knowledge base, etc.
Worked with a Fortune 500 healthcare company on various initiatives to improve their web and mobile experiences
Manage a team of 8 developers, providing leadership and career support
Led numerous teams on various client and internal products with a focus on mentorship

work.name: Cox Automotive
work.description: Software engineer on a team building automotive inspection solutions for dealerships
highlights: Worked on a team that built an internal application used by employees to inspect vehicles
Led the effort to commercialize the internal application and turn it into a public facing application called Next Inspect
Helped build and maintain a number of other applications within the Cox Auto ecosystem that combined, increased the divisions revenue by 20%

work.name: OnQ
work.description: Started my career at a startup focused on building a learning platform for company employees
highlights: Worked alongside senior engineers to build the web UI for the learning platform
Worked on a team to greenfield the companies official mobile application
Led an effort to fork a WYSIWYG editor and modify it for our use case.
